info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:06AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 706 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was near Clifton Park moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL BE NEAR... Cohoes, Latham, Waterford and Loudonville around 715 AM EST. Troy, Watervliet and Green Island around 720 AM EST. Menands around 725 AM EST. Center Brunswick, Wynantskill and Wyantskill around 730 AM EST. West Sand Lake around 740 AM EST. Grafton and Averill Park around 750 AM EST. Berlin around 800 AM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 25a and 28. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 4 and 7, and between exits 8A and 10. Interstate 787 between exits 6 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
